content: this fun hexi cardi is a quick and easy crochet project it is fully customizable while my gray sample used dk weight yarn and an i 5 5mm hook you can use any yarn with the recommended hook for that yarn the black and neon sample used sock weight yarn and an h 5 5 mm hook you can also choose to play with textures and colors by doing stripes the gauge is not essential to match mine as you continue in the round until you have reached the size you desire the gauge listed with this pattern had 21 stitches which was 7 clusters i added the row above and below so technically it was only 4 clusters with a space between for the 4 inches again gauge is not essential on this project this pattern includes a chart and stitch glossary as well as some personal tips and tricks to help you as you go as always please feel free to reach out to me with questions or concerns
